name: Buy Me A Coffee
description: Support my work and creativity on Buy Me A Coffee! As a passionate computer engineer specializing in MERN stack development, I strive to bring innovative projects to life. By contributing, you help me continue exploring new technologies, sharing knowledge, and enhancing my skills. Your support means the world to me and fuels my journey in the tech industry. Thank you for considering a donation!
